author: Tricia Dunn
title: Final Call for 50 on Fire Nominations
text:

This is it, Boston. If you know someone changing the game in Boston, shaking up their industry and just generally nailing it, we want to hear from you --now! Nominations for our annual 50 on Fire awards close tonight at midnight. 
In case you haven't heard, 50 on Fire is our year-end awards celebration recognizing the cityâ€™s inventors, disrupters, luminaries, and newsmakers across all industries. Here's a breakdown of the categories we're looking at this year. 
Make your nominations , then snag your Early Bird ticket to the hottest celebration of the year on December 3rd.
